# BenQ-W1070-IR-remote
List of NEC signals used by the benQ W1070 to communicate with an infra-red remote.

You can use this list to reproduce the BenQ-W1070 projector's remote or build an automation system with some electronics.


| COMMAND | ENCODING |  CODE (32 bits) |  RAWDATA [67] | DATA |
|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|
|  **Power on**  | NEC | CF20D | {9000,4450, 600,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 600,500, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,450, 650,500, 650,1600, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,450, 650,1600, 650};  // NEC CF20D | 0xCF20D  |
|  **Power off**  | NEC | C728D |  {9000,4450, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,1650, 600,1650, 600,1600, 650,500, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,500, 650,1600, 650,450, 650,500, 600,500, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 600,1600, 650};  // NEC C728D | 0xC728D |
|  **HDMI-1**  | NEC | C1AE5 |  {9050,4400, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 600,1650, 600,500, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,450, 650,500, 650,1600, 650,450, 650,1600, 650};  // NEC C1AE5 | 0xC1AE5 |
| **HDMI-2** | NEC | C9A65 | {9050,4400, 650,500, 600,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,1600, 600,1650, 600,500, 650,500, 600,1650, 600,500, 650,500, 600,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 650,1600, 650,450, 650,500, 650,1600, 600,1650, 600,500, 650,500, 600,1650, 600,500, 650,1600, 650};  // NEC C9A65 | 0xC9A65 |
| **WIRELESS** | NEC | C619E | {9050,4400, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,1600, 600,1650, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,1650, 600,1600, 650,500, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 600};  // NEC C619E | 0xC619E |
| **Video** | NEC | C4AB5 | {9050,4400, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,1650, 600,1600, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,1600, 650,450, 650,500, 650,1600, 600,500, 650,1600, 650,500, 600,1650, 600,500, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,500, 650,1600, 600};  // NEC C4AB5 | 0xC4AB5 |
| **PC-VGA** | NEC | C827D | {9050,4400, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,1650, 600,500, 650,500, 600,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 600,1600, 650};  // NEC C827D | 0xC827D |
| **Componant** | NEC | C8A75 | {9050,4400, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,1550, 700,450, 650,1600, 650,500, 600,500, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 600,1600, 650,500, 650,1600, 650};  // NEC C8A75 | 0xC8A75 |
| **Menu/Exit** | NEC | CF00F | {9000,4450, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,500, 600,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,500, 600,500, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,1600, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 650,500, 650,450, 700,450, 650,450, 650,500, 650,1600, 650,1600, 600,1650, 600,1650, 650};  // NEC CF00F | 0xCF00F |

This list was simply build with an arduino and the IRremote library (https://github.com/z3t0/Arduino-IRremote).
